461.title: An Act Concerning The Removal Of Restrictive Covenants In Instruments Affecting Title To Real Property.
461.description: To extend restrictive covenant prohibitions to restrictions based on creed, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender identity or expression, marital status, age, lawful source of income, familial status or status as a veteran.

858.title: An Act Prohibiting Sex Or Gender-based Differential Pricing For Substantially Similar Goods Or Services.
858.description: To provide that it shall be a discriminatory practice for a business to charge different prices for substantially similar goods or services if the difference is due to sex or gender identity or expression.
